special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Shoalar can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: Shoalarâ€™s innate spellcasting ability is Constitution (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells (an asterisked spell is from appendix B): At will: shape water* 1/day: create or destroy water

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: Shoalar is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks).

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage
